ENABLE_HTTPSTREAM_DESC: Activate the HTTP output to stream audio over the network.
DISABLE_HTTPSTREAM_DESC: Deactivate the HTTP output and stop streaming audio.
HTTPSERVERCONFIG_DESC: Configure the HTTP server for audio streaming.
SERVERNAME_LABEL: Enter the name of the stream.
HENCODER_DESC: Select the encoder plugin for the HTTP stream.
BITRATE_DESC: Specify the bitrate for the HTTP stream.
STREAMFORMAT_DESC: Select the audio format for the HTTP stream.
SERVERPORT_DESC: Enter the port number for the HTTP server.
HTTPADDITIONNAL_DESC: Enable or disable additional HTTP parameters.
MAXCLIENTS_DESC: Set the maximum number of concurrent HTTP clients (0 for no limit).
BUFFERTIME_DESC: Specify the buffer time in milliseconds.
OUTBURSTTIME_DESC: Specify the outburst time in milliseconds.
ICESERVERNAME_DESC: Specify the network address for the Icecast server (IPv4, IPv6, or local socket).
ICEMOUNTPOINT_DESC: Specify the mount point for the Icecast server.
ICESTREAMNAME_DESC: Set the name of the Icecast stream.
ICESTREAMNAME_LABEL: Enter the name of the stream.
ICEADDITIONAL_DESC: Enable or disable additional parameters for the Icecast stream.
ICEDESCRIPTION_DESC: Provide a description for the Icecast stream.
ICEGENRE_DESC: Set the genre metadata for the stream (optional).
ICEGENRE_LABEL: Enter the genre of the stream.
ICEURL_DESC: Provide the website URL associated with the stream (optional).
ICESERVERCONFIG_DESC: Configure the Icecast server for audio streaming.
ICEPUBLISHPORT_DESC: Specify the port number for publishing the stream to the server.
ICEPROTOCOL_DESC: Select the protocol used for the Icecast stream (e.g., Icecast2, Shoutcast).
ICEUSER_DESC: Specify the username for Icecast authentication. Leave empty if not required.
ICEPASSWORD_DESC: Specify the password for Icecast authentication. Leave empty if not required.
ICEPUBLIC_DESC: Specify if the stream should be listed publicly.
ENABLE_ICESTREAM_DESC: Connect to an Icecast server for audio streaming.
